summary.Title: Pizza chef, Stathelle, Norway
summary.Presentation: Hafsund Feriehytter as / avd Sjøterrassen, Stathelle, Norway, is looking for a pizza chef.Job descriptionAs a pizza chef at Sjøterrassen, you will be primarily respons

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Hafsund Feriehytter as / avd Sjøterrassen, Stathelle, Norway, is looking for a pizza chef.

Job description

As a pizza chef at Sjøterrassen, you will be primarily responsible for the pizza section, working independently to create delicious, authentic pizzas. However, it is also important that you are part of a team and can assist your colleagues across the kitchen when needed. You will work closely with the head chef to maintain quality and efficiency, while also being a reliable team player during busy periods.

Skills
  • Quality Control
  • Communication ++
  • Hygiene and Safety
  • Stress Management
  • Customer Service and Guest Satisfaction
  • Language: speak English or scandinavian must.


Working hours

40 hours week at Hafsundveien 10, 3967 Stathelle, Norway

Period

14.05.2025 to end of august 2025

Salary NOK 235/hour

Other information

Some of the staff will stay in a shared cabin, only five minutes' walk from the restaurant. The cabins are well-equipped with all necessary facilities for a practical and comfortable living experience.

More information

Tommy Larsen, +47 9408 6351, Post@sjoterrassen.com

How to apply?

Send your application to Tommy Larsen at Post@sjoterrassen.com
Latest application date is 01.03.2025

(from NAV EURES Norway)



Sjøterrassen is more than just a restaurant – it’s a place where the beauty of nature meets lively activities and great food. Located along the coast, just a short drive from the nearest city, Sjøterrassen is a popular destination for both locals and visitors. Here, guests can enjoy concerts, motorshows, and exciting events while relaxing on our beach or exploring our guest harbor. For our employees, we focus on creating a positive and energetic work environment where well-being is a top priority. We believe that a good team that thrives together produces the best results, which is why we place great emphasis on creating a workplace where everyone feels seen and valued.

Working at Sjøterrassen gives you the opportunity to be part of creating unforgettable experiences for both guests and colleagues in an inspiring seaside setting.

http://www.sjoterrassen.no/
